scripts.server:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development env-cmd -e dev,common -r .env-cmdrc.js node server.js
scripts.server:release: cross-env NODE_ENV=development env-cmd -e release,common -r .env-cmdrc.js node server.js
scripts.server:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=development env-cmd -e prod,common -r .env-cmdrc.js node server.js
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -e dev,common -r .env-cmdrc.js next build
scripts.build:release: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -e release,common -r .env-cmdrc.js next build
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -e prod,common -r .env-cmdrc.js next build
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -e dev,common -r .env-cmdrc.js node server.js
scripts.start:release: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -e release,common -r .env-cmdrc.js node server.js
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -e prod,common -r .env-cmdrc.js node server.js
scripts.start:pm2: cross-env NODE_ENV=production env-cmd -e dev,common -r .env-cmdrc.js pm2 start ./ecosystem.config.js --env production
